lead_paragraph: CARON--Anne T.,(Flanagan), 84, died at the Orchard Cove Retirement Community in Canton, MA on Saturday, January 9, 2016. She was the wife of the late Wilfred R. Caron. Born and raised in New York City, she was a graduate of Villa Maria Academy and St. John's University. Anne was a resident of Canton for four years after living in Little Compton, RI for 16 years. Prior to that, she resided in Scarborough, NY and Washington, DC. Mrs. Caron worked for IBM in New York, New Jersey and Washington, DC for 35 years, retiring as a manager in 1991. She enjoyed reading and was very active at Orchard Cove. Mrs. Caron was the sister of Catherine A. Sheehan of Brentwood, NY and the late John J. Flanagan. She is also survived by several nieces and nephews. Visitation will be held from the Farley Funeral Home, 358 Park St. (Rt.27), Stoughton, MA on Friday from 9-10am followed by a Funeral Mass at St. James Church, Stoughton at 10:30am. Interment will take place at the Massachusetts National Cemetery, Bourne. In lieu of flowers, donations in Anne's memory may be made to Massachusetts General Hospital Cancer Research, Development Office, 125 Nashua St., Suite 540, Boston, MA 02114. Directions and obituary at www.farley fh.com. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  CARON, ANNE T.
